pr_title: Handle nulls properly in flatmap reader

timeline.bodyText: Just for my understanding, I believe this is the real bug. But inMapVectors[i] is already null as it was just allocated in the top so this code is no-op,so this entire code is removed.
timeline.author: arunthirupathi
